segments.text: Hello , sir . Have you reserved already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , is there a single room left ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , how long will you intend to stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For a week or so . Do you give discount for a week or more ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we give 5 % discount for a week and 12 % for 2 weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I will take a room for a week . Here is my passport .
segments.speaker: S2
